data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Oud-Heverlee awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 1, Genk to take a throw-in in Oud-Heverlee territory.
Throw-in for Genk close to the penalty box.
Genk have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 2, Jasper Vergoote awards the away team a throw-in.
Jasper Vergoote signals a Genk throw-in in Oud-Heverlee's half.
Genk have been awarded a corner by Jasper Vergoote.
In the minute 3, Cyriel Dessers (Genk) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Oud-Heverlee have a goal kick.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Thibault Vlietinck for Oud-Heverlee who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 5, It's a goal kick for the home team in Genk.
Thibault Vlietinck is back on the pitch.
Jasper Vergoote awards Oud-Heverlee a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Oud-Heverlee in their own half.
Genk's Dries Wouters has been booked in Genk.
Throw-in for Genk in their own half.
In the minute 9, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jasper Vergoote signals a free kick to Genk.
Jasper Vergoote signals a throw-in for Oud-Heverlee, close to Genk's area.
In the minute 11, Theo Bongonda gets his shot on target but fails to score for Genk.
Genk attack but Theo Bongonda's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Oud-Heverlee at Luminus Arena.
In the minute 12, Ball safe as Oud-Heverlee is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Genk are coming forward and Theo Bongonda gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Oud-Heverlee goal kick.
In the minute 16, Corner awarded to Genk.
Genk have been awarded a corner by Jasper Vergoote.
Genk's Jhon Lucumi breaks free at Luminus Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 20, Goal kick for Oud-Heverlee at Luminus Arena.
Oud-Heverlee have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Genk.
In the minute 23, Ball goes out of play for a Oud-Heverlee goal kick.
Daan Vekemans of Oud-Heverlee smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Oud-Heverlee drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 25, Isaac Asante of Oud-Heverlee gets in a strike, but is off target.
Jasper Vergoote awards Genk a goal kick.
Daniel Munoz for Genk gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 26, Ball goes out of play for a Oud-Heverlee goal kick.
Can Genk get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oud-Heverlee's half?
Genk pushes forward through Carlos Cuesta, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 31, Corner awarded to Genk.
Throw-in for Genk in the half of Oud-Heverlee.
Genk awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in high up the field for Genk in Genk.
Genk's Theo Bongonda gets in a shot on goal at Luminus Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Genk at Luminus Arena.
In the minute 36, Oud-Heverlee are pushing forward but Kamal Sowah's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Genk at Luminus Arena.
Jasper Vergoote signals a Genk throw-in in Oud-Heverlee's half.
In the minute 37, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Attention is being given to Oud-Heverleeâ€™s Isaac Asante and play has been suspended briefly.
Genk's Theo Bongonda gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 39, It's a goal kick for the away team in Genk.
Oud-Heverlee's Isaac Asante looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Throw-in for Genk in the half of Oud-Heverlee.
In the minute 44, Throw-in Oud-Heverlee.
Free kick for Oud-Heverlee in the half of Genk.
At Luminus Arena, Genk are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in for Oud-Heverlee in their own half.
Genk to take a throw-in in Oud-Heverlee territory.
In the minute 45, Genk's Joakim Maehle misses with an attempt on goal.
Jasper Vergoote awards Oud-Heverlee a goal kick.
Throw-in for Oud-Heverlee at Luminus Arena.
In the minute 45, Jasper Vergoote signals a free kick to Genk in their own half.
In Genk Oud-Heverlee attack through Xavier Mercier. The finish is off target, however.
Genk have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Jasper Vergoote will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Jere Uronen for Genk gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Genk.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Luminus Arena.
In the minute 45, Play has been interrupted briefly in Genk to check on David Hubert, who is grimacing with pain.
Jasper Vergoote has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Free kick Genk.
David Hubert for Oud-Heverlee is back on the field again.
Hannes Wolf (Genk) is making a first substitution, with Paul Onuachu replacing Mats Moller Daehli.
Genk have been awarded a corner by Jasper Vergoote.
In the minute 47, Genk are in shooting range from this free kick.
Oud-Heverlee needs to be cautious. Genk have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Genk.
In the minute 49, Jasper Vergoote signals a free kick to Genk in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Oud-Heverlee goal kick.
In Genk a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 51, Goal kick for Genk at Luminus Arena.
Jasper Vergoote signals a free kick to Genk.
Genk's Theo Bongonda breaks free at Luminus Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 54, Oud-Heverlee have a goal kick.
Goal! Junya Ito gives Genk a 1-0 lead in Genk.
Jasper Vergoote awards Oud-Heverlee a goal kick.
In the minute 57, Can Genk get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oud-Heverlee's half?
Throw-in for Genk in the half of Oud-Heverlee.
Oud-Heverlee awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Genk in their own half.
Pierre-Yves Ngawa (Oud-Heverlee) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Yannick Aguemon is on a sub for Daan Vekemans for Oud-Heverlee.
In the minute 61, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Thomas Henry for Oud-Heverlee drives towards goal at Luminus Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
The home team have replaced Theo Bongonda with Kouassi Eboue. This is the second substitution made today by Hannes Wolf.
In the minute 63, Throw-in Oud-Heverlee.
Jasper Vergoote awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Oud-Heverlee is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 64, Junya Ito (Genk) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick Oud-Heverlee.
Marc Brys is making the team's second substitution at Luminus Arena with Yohan Croizet replacing Isaac Asante.
In the minute 65, Ball goes out of play for a Genk goal kick.
Corner awarded to Genk.
Paul Onuachu (Genk) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 67, It's a goal kick for the away team in Genk.
Free kick for Oud-Heverlee in the half of Genk.
In Genk a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 70, Jasper Vergoote awards Genk a goal kick.
Jasper Vergoote signals a free kick to Oud-Heverlee in their own half.
Important block from the Genk defence as Kamal Sowah fires in a strike for Oud-Heverlee.
In the minute 74, Oud-Heverlee have been awarded a corner by Jasper Vergoote.
Goal kick for Genk at Luminus Arena.
Genk awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Genk in their own half.
Benjamin Nygren is replacing Cyriel Dessers for the home team.
Junya Ito of Genk is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 78, Genk awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Genk have a goal kick.
In Genk, Paul Onuachu of Genk is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Oud-Heverlee in their own half.
Can Oud-Heverlee capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Genk's half?
Can Oud-Heverlee capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 85, Jasper Vergoote signals a free kick to Oud-Heverlee in their own half.
Thomas Henry gets an equalizer for Oud-Heverlee. The score is now 1-1.
Free kick for Genk in the half of Oud-Heverlee.
In the minute 87, Jasper Vergoote awards Oud-Heverlee a goal kick.
Olivier Myny is replacing Thibault Vlietinck for Oud-Heverlee at Luminus Arena.
Can Genk get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oud-Heverlee's half?
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Oud-Heverlee to take a throw-in in Genk territory.
Genk awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Genk in their own half.
Genk surge into the attack at Luminus Arena but Daniel Munozâ€™s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Genk.
Throw-in Oud-Heverlee.
Jasper Vergoote signals a Oud-Heverlee throw-in in Genk's half.
Ball safe as Genk is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Full-time! The final score is 1-1.
Thomas Henry is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
